page.title: 17 Winsford Civic Hall
page.content: In Winsford we have a Civic Hall. The Civic Hall offers a wide range of entertainment which includes discos organised by the police,theatre productions and two small bars. In the entrance hall is a refreshment bar. At the far end of the main hall is one of the bars, the other being in the Weaver room. At the end of the main hall is a stage on which concerts and plays are held. The floor of the hall is a wooden dance floor for ballroom dancing and discos. Also you can hire the hall for wedding receptions or for big parties or celebrations. They hold annual concerts and a weekly disco. As well as these entertainments they hire celebrities.
